participant_1.background:
I hunt, bike and study my way through my day, thanks to my loving family.
i am a youtube.
I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
I am not vain, but I do take care of my appearance because I want to look my best when I travel with my twin sister.
I love to eat pizza, it helps me to relax and forget about my anxiety.

participant_2.background:
I would love to have lunch with Jesus, as I would love to learn more about his teachings and how they can be applied to my life.
I miss my family but I'm grateful for their support.
My spouse is a stay-at-home parent, and they do a great job of taking care of our children and our home.
i have my own greenhouse.
i live in pittsburgh.

content.text: Hi, it's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! How's your day going?
It's going well, thanks! I'm just relaxing and enjoying some pizza.
That sounds nice! I'm currently working on a project for work.
I'm working on a greenhouse for my backyard.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to have a greenhouse.
It's a lot of work, but it's really rewarding.
I can imagine! What kind of plants do you plan on growing?
I'm planning on growing tomatoes, peppers, and cucumbers.
That sounds delicious! I love fresh tomatoes.
Me too! I can't wait to eat them all summer long.
You're going to have to let me know how they turn out.
Of course! I'll be sure to send you a picture.
Thanks! I'm looking forward to it.
